arabic_text: وَيُطۡعِمُونَ ٱلطَّعَامَ عَلَىٰ حُبِّهِۦ مِسۡكِينٗا وَيَتِيمٗا وَأَسِيرًا
translation: (8) And they give food in spite of love for it[1813] to the needy, the orphan, and the captive,
footnotes: [1813]- The meaning here may also be "out of love for Him," i.e., Allāh (subḥānahu wa taʿālā).
